Articles.Content:
About 50 percent of the time I freeze on load when almost completely loaded. I am having trouble determining the mod that is causing this. I also occasionally get a bug where the contract info window will not display upon clicking. A null reference exception.

LOG: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/6911908/KSP.log

done: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/6911908/Player.log

didnt know that existed.

Just did a fresh install and put the mods back on. Same issue.

I have nvidia cards, im running through steam with the following launch params:

LD_PRELOAD="libpthread.so.0 libGL.so.1" __GL_THREADED_OPTIMIZATIONS=1 %command%_64

NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object
  at (wrapper stelemref) object:stelemref (object,intptr,object)
  at PartLoader.ParsePart (.UrlConfig urlConfig, .ConfigNode node) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at PartLoader+.MoveNext () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

Ahh, this.

I have seen it too, but I really have no idea what causes it - it doesn't happen all the time or always on the same part. It does seem to trigger at a certain threshold number of part mods though.

I'm not sure this is actually attributable to any specific mod, the error looks to be coming from Squads part loader...
ok then, thats sort of the idea I had too.
